data.name: RPG Maker MZ - 90s Retro Sounds - Battle
data.detailed_description:
This is a sound set reminiscent of the 1990s consumer RPG games.
Through restricting the number of simultaneous sounds to mimic the hardware limitation of the days, these unique game tune styles of the 90s will color your work with a classic, nostalgic feel of the old days.

This set contains 10 tracks intended to be used in battle scenes.

This set especially suits those who likes mildly emotional melodies of the 90s but with less "bleep” elements.

■Included music（ogg）
1.Violent attack（Normal battle）
2.Gushing out blade（Normal battle）
3.Swift wind（Normal battle）
4.Destruction（Normal battle）
5.Counterattack（Mid-boss battle）
6.Crushing evil（Mid-boss battle）
7.Hero（Last Boss battle）
8.Fate（Last Boss battle）
9.For the victors（battle victory）
10.Dividends（battle victory）
